hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LOCK_FILE="$HOME/.docker-login-lock" COUNT_FILE="$HOME/.docker-login-count"
function down { local COUNT
lockfile -1 -l 60 $LOCK_FILE if [ $? -ne 0 ] then >&2 echo "down: failed to lock" return 1 fi # >&2 echo "down: locked"
if [ -f "$COUNT_FILE" ] then source "$COUNT_FILE" COUNT=$(($COUNT-1)) if [ $COUNT -lt 0 ] then >&2 echo "down: count < 0" COUNT=0 fi else COUNT=0 fi
>&2 echo "COUNT=$COUNT" > "$COUNT_FILE" # >&2 echo "down: count=$COUNT"
\rm -f $LOCK_FILE if [ $? -ne 0 ] then >&2 echo "down: failed to unlock" return 2 fi # >&2 echo "down: unlocked" echo $COUNT return 0 }
RC=$(down)
if [ $RC -eq 0 ]; then docker logout fi
